definition[0]: the person or thing that is worse than all others
example[0]: I think the worst is over now.
example[1]: The worst of it is  (=the worst part of the situation is), I can’t tell anyone what’s happening.
example[2]: This year’s harvest is the worst that people can remember.
example[3]: Last year was by far the worst  (=much worse than any other) for road accidents.
example[4]: You saw the garden at its worst, I’m afraid  (=when it is worse than at any other time).
